page.title: 15ACTIVITIES AND CLUBS
page.content: The activities and clubs attended by people in the area can be divided into two groups, those found in the villages and those outside the block. Local activities geared towards children are; choir,brownies,gymnastics,guides.Outsi de activities include;cubs,judo,majorettes,swimming, trampolining,dancing,karate. Adult clubs and activities seem better catered for within the area and fewer have to travel outside the block. Local clubs are;bingo,bridge,painting,whist,Wednes day group,Thursday group,Mothers Union,W.I.,yoga,Over sixties,badminton,craft. Adults travel for;weightlifting,football,squash,keep -fit.
